name: NPC (Out of control camera)
description:
GAME IS FRUSTED AS TO SHOW OUT OF CONTROL SITUATION

STORY

in matrix game where everything is control by super computer .One man understand that this world is not real and just a computer interpretation so he try to close the matrix but matrix try to stop it by taking control of camera of the game which he put on that man so man try to close matrix without knowing what comes in front of him .although this game about sci-fi game where yout have to defet evil but the man is side charcter or NPC who is initially used to test the game so hr contains all the charcter codes ............... ................ in the end he close the buttOn wake up on post acolyptic world where he realise that this also just another game that means matrix still alive.
